data.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
data.description: Learn the principles of user interface and user experience design from scratch. Cover wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing.

data.title: Advanced Figma Techniques
data.description: Master Figma components, auto-layout, variables, and advanced prototyping. Build production-ready design systems.

data.title: Typography Masterclass
data.description: Deep dive into type hierarchy, pairing, and readability. Learn to choose and use fonts that elevate your designs.

data.title: JavaScript for Beginners
data.description: Start your coding journey with JavaScript. Learn variables, functions, DOM manipulation, and modern ES6+ syntax.

data.title: React Complete Guide
data.description: Build modern web apps with React 18. Hooks, context, performance optimization, and real-world project patterns.

data.title: Node.js Backend Development
data.description: Build scalable APIs and backend services with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL. REST, authentication, and deployment.

data.title: Strategic Business Planning
data.description: Develop effective business strategies using frameworks like OKRs, SWOT, and Lean Canvas. From idea to execution.

data.title: Leadership and Management
data.description: Build high-performing teams and lead with confidence. Covers 1:1s, feedback, hiring, and engineering management.

data.title: Financial Analysis Essentials
data.description: Understand financial statements, valuation models, and investment analysis. Essential skills for founders and managers.

data.title: Digital Marketing Strategy
data.description: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns. SEO, paid ads, analytics, and conversion rate optimization.

data.title: Social Media Marketing
data.description: Grow your brand on Instagram, LinkedIn, and TikTok. Content strategy, community building, and paid campaigns.

data.title: Content Marketing Mastery
data.description: Create content that attracts, engages, and converts. Blogging, video scripts, email sequences, and SEO writing.
